homedefaultJson.title: Max Plumer
homedefaultJson.description: I am a Web Developer, Certified through Vanderbilt University, with skills in both the back-end and front-end of web applications. I have a strong history with building client relations, and a passion for improving my craft.
homedefaultJson.subtitle: Creative Web & App Developer
homedefaultJson.description2: My current role as Business Operations Manager has taught me the importance of viewing the challenges of a business through the lens of a developer and utilizing cutting-edge web technologies to constantly improve the customer experience. I enjoy every step of the design process, from discussion and collaboration.
